'''"Finnick's Cranberry Sea"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Finnick's Cranberry Sea" is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=240}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.

|time = 16h
